alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 3:09PM CDT until August 20 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 309 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walterhill, or near Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Watertown, Walterhill, Auburntown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Lascassas and Milton. This includes Interstate 840 near mile marker 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
